description: A baseball magazine that focuses on batting tips.  There are lots of colorful, full-page photos of skilled athletes demonstrating proper form and technique.

variants.description: A baseball magazine that focuses on batting tips.  There are lots of colorful, full-page photos of skilled athletes demonstrating proper form and technique.

name.str_pl: copies of The Science of Baseball

variants.description: Author, as  well as several experts via interviews, covers topics like what makes the ball break, bounce, and fly; how material science and physics work together to make the bat function; how hitters use physics, geometry, and force to connect; injuries; and much more.

name.str: Bash Weapons for Self-Defense: A Practical Guide
name.str_pl: copies of Bash Weapons for Self-Defense: A Practical Guide

variants.description: Small brochure of unknown self-defense shop, focused on using bash weapons for self-defense in real-world situations. It cover topics like assessing threats, using verbal commands and body language to de-escalate situations, and legal considerations for using force in self-defense. It also include techniques for using bash weapons to defend against attackers armed with knives, guns, and other weapons.

name.str_pl: copies of tactical baton defense manual

description: An informative guide to self-defense using clubs and batons.  Aimed at the law enforcement and military market, it is packed with time tested, no-nonsense information and written to be understandable for beginners.

name.str_pl: copies of tactical baton defense manual

variants.description: An informative guide to self-defense using clubs and batons.  Aimed at the law enforcement and military market, it is packed with time tested, no-nonsense information and written to be understandable for beginners.

name.str: The Art and Science of Stick Fighting
name.str_pl: copies of The Art and Science of Stick Fighting

variants.description: Non-style specific guide of fighting with the short stick, with few levels of instructions from easy to master, and a lot of photos of movements with motion arrows.

Comprohensive guide of how to do demolition works on your own piece of land - from replacing the pavement to total house deconstruction - using only common instruments.  Surprisingly not so hard, as you just need to know how and when hit the thing.
"The Authoritative Guide to Using the Cane or Walking Stick for Self-Defense", the book provide plenty of ways to use essential tool as a sturdy weapon.
